name: BubbleJam
description:
GMTK 2021 jay!

So in my head this was supposed to be an awesome axplosion of colours but you know 2 days is not much time^^

Goal: Combine colours to create colour combinations.

You start with white and have to find a base colour then another one to combine into a combined colour. Opposing colours and white will make you lose your colour!

Theres no point system for now..

also supports couchcoop! (this is where all that time got lost ;))
